title: Adults-Only Bali Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description: Spoilt with views of rice paddies in every room and waterfalls, jungle and ocean nearby - this adults-only wellness retreat is everything you could want from a northern Bali escape. Spend time in the serene surrounds of Sambangan practising yoga in the hilltop Shala, and heal from the inside out with farm-to-table fare at two eateries - with ingredients sourced locally from organic gardens. Holistic wellness is at the forefront of life at Maha Hills, with activities including healer-led meditation and traditional Balinese rituals offered daily, alongside indulgent spa treatments, fresh-fruit cocktails and a glistening infinity pool. When you feel like exploring, the sparkling Aling Aling waterfall and the island's untouched northern beaches are a short drive away.
offer_address: Jalan Tiying Tali, Banjar Anyar 8, Sambangan, Kec. Sukasada, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia

title: Bali Hilltop Wellness Retreat near Lovina with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Nightly Cocktails & Dolphin Tour
description:
Savour views of rice paddies from every room and waterfalls, jungle and ocean nearby at this idyllic wellness retreat near Lovina. Your included dolphin spotting tour is the perfect introduction to the majestic marine life, black sands and villages of this idyllic Northern Bali destination.

Spend time in the serene surroundings of Sambangan practising yoga in the hilltop Shala, and heal from the inside out with farm-to-table fare at two eateries - with ingredients sourced locally from organic gardens.

Holistic wellness is at the forefront of life at Maha Hills, with activities including healer-led meditation and traditional Balinese rituals offered daily, alongside indulgent spa treatments, fresh-fruit cocktails and a glistening infinity pool.
offer_address: Jalan Tiying Tali, Banjar Anyar 8, Sambangan, Kec. Sukasada, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia
